page.title: 05Religion in East Leicester.
page.content:
I am{Hindu}& I go to St.Saviour's Road Temple. Inside are the pictures of our Gods and our special red books. The Ramayan book contains prayers. I only know one prayer from it,the first word is Omjay and this means God. The Greeta book tells God's stories.
I am a{Sikh}& I go to the Guru Tegh Bahadur Sikh Temple. Our holy book is called the Guru Granth Sahib. This book is respected as if it is a living person. Every evening it is put to bed in a special room.
I am a{Muslim.}At Mosque we sing holy songs and we say our DU'A. DU'A is in six parts and we say it in Arabic. We say our DU'A three times a day,once in the morning and twice in the evening.
